sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Typography,
  Button,
  Container,
  Paper,
  Grid,
  Avatar
} from '@mui/material';
import MetadataIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Description';
import CoverIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Image';

const TaskDashboard = () => {
  return (
    <Container maxWidth="lg">
      <Box sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 4 }}>
        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 4 }}>
          <Avatar sx={{ mr: 2 }} />
          <Typography variant="body1" color="primary">
            Do you want to maximize book sales? Start a new task below, and I'll assist you further.
          </Typography>
        </Box>

        <Grid container spacing={3}>
          <Grid item xs={12}>
            <Paper sx={{ p: 3 }}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
                <Box sx={{ mr: 3 }}>
                  <MetadataIcon sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: 'primary.main' }} />
                </Box>
                <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
                  <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                    Craft and optimize metadata
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                    I'll provide tailored suggestions to optimize your metadata for improved organic visibility and sales in stores.
                  </Typography>
                  <Button
                    variant="outlined"
                    color="primary"
                    sx={{ mt: 2 }}
                  >
                    PREVIEW
                  </Button>
                </Box>
              </Box>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>

          <Grid item xs={12}>
            <Paper sx={{ p: 3 }}>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
                <Box sx={{ mr: 3 }}>
                  <CoverIcon sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: 'primary.main' }} />
                </Box>
                <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
                  <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                    Create a cover image
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                    I'll choose scenes based on your manuscript that effectively represent its content. I'll then generate cover images for each scene, which you can modify, request additional ones, and download in various formats.
                  </Typography>
                  <Button
                    variant="outlined"
                    color="primary"
                    sx={{ mt: 2 }}
                  >
                    PREVIEW
                  </Button>
                </Box>
              </Box>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Box>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default TaskDashboard;
